topic.title: A story about covid19
topic.body: in Oct 2019, wuhan china hosted a world sport game for soldiers including American soldiers. However, the most powerful American soldiers failed in almost all games. When all soldiers left wuhan china, the covid19 outbreak just in the fish market which is nearby the hotel where American soldiers lived.

1584527258_1HeEWnYs69J1BV4P4niDN775yBVqN.body: the government would never tell you the truth.

However, the most powerful American soldiers failed in almost all games.
